text: Courfaivre was a municipality of the district of Del√©mont in the canton of Jura in Switzerland. On 1 January 2013, the former municipalities of Courfaivre, Bassecourt, Glovelier, Soulce and Undervelier merged into the new municipality of Haute-Sorne. ==Other websites== *Official Website of Courfaivre * Category:Former municipalities of Jura Category:2013 disestablishments in Switzerland
